import React from 'react'; import '../styles/login.css'; //To do : new user admin with invitation only const Login = (props) => { const { email, setEmail, password, setPassword, handleLogin, handleSignup, hasAccount, setHasAccount, emailError, passwordError, } = props; return (
setEmail(e.target.value)} />

{emailError}

setPassword(e.target.value)} />

{passwordError}

{hasAccount ? ( <>

Don't Have an account?{' '} setHasAccount( !hasAccount ) } > Sign up

) : ( <>

Have an account? setHasAccount( !hasAccount ) } > Sign in

)}
); }; export default Login;
